Nov. 15, 2008 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Second Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-contest-second-section
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist: Evan Smith - Euphonium (Blaenavon Town) Prizes - 1st £400, 2nd £300, 3rd £190. 7 bands competed
June 19, 2012, 8:32 p.m. July 2, 2020, 9:32 a.m.
